basicInfo.name: Diaochan
basicInfo.flavor: It is said that even the moon blushes at Diaochan's beauty and hides its face in the clouds, giving her the nickname Blushing Moon.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 100% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
 - Ally with Lowest Current HP (Excluding Self)
 - Heals HP equal to 6% of the caster's Max HP.
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Healing: HP Recovery amount becomes equal to 7% of the caster's Max HP.

Skill 1.name: Forward March
Skill 1.desc:
3 Allies
 - Heals HP equal to 25% of the caster's Max HP.
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Healing: HP Recovery amount becomes equal to 29% of the caster's Max HP.
Transcend Lv.2 Effect
 - 2 Allies (Excluding Self)
 - Adds Effect: Resets skill cooldown if target type is Attack or Magic.

Skill 2.name: Song of Protection
Skill 2.desc:
2 Allies (Excluding Self)
 - Grants Crit Damage Boost. [Duration: 4 Turn(s)]
 - Grants All Attack Boost. [Duration: 4 Turn(s)]
 - 3 Enemies
 - 100% chance to inflict Buff Duration Reduction. [Reduced by: 2 Turn(s)]
 - 85% chance to inflict Sleep. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Chance: Sleep chance becomes 100%.
 - 2 Allies (Excluding Self)
 - Adds Effect: 30% All Attack Boost. [Duration: 4 Turn(s)]
Transcend Lv.6 Effect
 - Adds Effect: 100% chance to inflict 78% Incoming Healing Reduction. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]

Passive.name: Blushing Moon's Smile
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Max HP-Based Effect Hit Rate Boost [Always Active]
 - Grants a Barrier equal to 39% of the caster's Max HP. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)] [Once per Round]
 - 2 Allies (Excluding Self)
 - *Grants the following effects if target type is Attack or Magic.
 - Grants a Barrier equal to 20% of the caster's Max HP upon using a basic attack 1 time(s). [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - Grants Crowd Control Immunity upon using a basic attack 1 time(s). [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Self
 - Increases Effect: Barrier absorption becomes 45% of Max HP.
 - 2 Allies (Excluding Self)

transcendence.transcend_7: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_8: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_9: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_10: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_11: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_12: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.

profile.likes: Lu Bu, good instruments, poetry, calligraphy, painting, beautiful things, fruit
profile.story: It is said that even the moon blushes at Diaochan's beauty and hides its face in the clouds, giving her the nickname Blushing Moon.

basicInfo.name: Diaochan
basicInfo.flavor: Diaochan's striking beauty and charming wit made her popular among men. She's said to be even more beautiful at night, earning her the nickname Moonlight.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 90% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
 - Ally with Lowest Current HP (Excluding Self)
 - Heals HP equal to 5% of the caster's Max HP.
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 90% of Physical Attack.

Skill 1.desc:
3 Allies
 - Heals HP equal to 23% of the caster's Max HP.

Skill 2.desc:

 - Grants Crit Damage Boost. [Duration: 4 Turn(s)]
 - 3 Enemies
 - 100% chance to inflict Buff Duration Reduction. [Reduced by: 2 Turn(s)]
 - 75% chance to inflict Sleep. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]

Passive.name: Blushing Moon's Smile
Passive.desc:
Self

 - Grants a Barrier equal to 35% of the caster's Max HP. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)] [Once per Round]
 - 2 Allies (Excluding Self)
 - *Grants the following effects if target type is Attack or Magic.
 - Grants a Barrier equal to 18% of the caster's Max HP upon using a basic attack 1 time(s). [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - Grants Crowd Control Immunity upon using a basic attack 1 time(s). [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]

basicInfo.name: Diaochan
basicInfo.flavor: Diaochan was originally a maid serving a lord in a small village. One day, bandits attacked the village, setting it ablaze, and she barely escaped with her life.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 80% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
 - Ally with Lowest Current HP (Excluding Self)
 - Heals HP equal to 4% of the caster's Max HP.
